called once test pack is copied/installed to storage dir. returns FALSE if shouldn't proceed with using test-pack on storage dir

getLocalPath

java.lang.String getLocalPath(AHost local_host)
returns local path to access storage directory. this will be a drive that the storage dir is mounted on (if remote) or the actual location of the storage dir (if local)

Parameters:
local_host -
Returns:

getRemotePath

java.lang.String getRemotePath(AHost local_host)
returns remote path to access storage directory on the remote host. for local file systems this will be the same as #getLocalPath. for remote file systems, this is the path on the remote host (which will be different than local path #getLocalPath)

Parameters:
local_host -
Returns:
